attributes.action: Stop local councils from prohibiting children from playing on communal grassed areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is based upon local and town councils who are continually neglecting or removing play areas for children of younger ages, the goverment need to set a a recommended amount of facilities/recreational areas that local and town councils must abide by.

It is all to commonly happening in the uk that childrens youth clubs and playing areas are either being closed or sold for houses and we wonder why our children get bored.

The older generation say we need to think of the future of our children and there children, this should also include play areas
